articles.author: Manish Singh
articles.title: Xiaomi winds down financial services business in India
articles.description: Xiaomi has discontinued its financial services in India, three years after launching payment and lending apps in the country.
articles.content: Xiaomi has quietly discontinued its financial services in India, less than three years after launching payment and lending apps in the key global market, two sources familiar with the matter told Tec… [+2824 chars]

articles.title: Elon Musk fired top Twitter execs including CEO, reports say
articles.description: According to these reports, Musk fired CEO Parag Agrawal, CFO Ned Segal, and other top executives at Twitter.
articles.content: Elon Musk fired key Twitter executives Thursday, one of his first moves as the official owner of the social media platform. According to reports from the New York Times, CNBC, theWall Street Journal,… [+602 chars]
